testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "demoqaUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed Then Alerts sekmesine tiklar................................................passed And ustten ikinci click me butonuna basar...................................passed And Allert in gorunur olmasini bekler.......................................passed Then Allert uzerindeki yazinin "This alert appeared after 5 seconds" oldugunu test eder.passed And Ok diyerek alerti kapatir...............................................passed
